markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Cry of Destruction](/Spells.aspx?ID=1794)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 374 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

Your voice booms, smashing what's in front of you. Each creature and unattended object in the area takes 1d8 sonic damage. If you already dealt damage to an enemy this turn with a Strike or spell, increase the damage dice from this spell to d12s.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Cry of Destruction

summary_markdown: Your voice booms, smashing what's in front of you.
text: Cry of Destruction Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 374 2.0 Domain Destruction Area 15-foot cone Defense basic Fortitude --- Your voice booms, smashing what's in front of you. Each creature and unattended object in the area takes 1d8 sonic damage. If you already dealt damage to an enemy this turn with a Strike or spell, increase the damage dice from this spell to d12s. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.
